events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision at the intersection and filed a new claim.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords such as vehicle and collision.
An agent experienced in handling auto accident claims has been assigned to ensure a smooth process.
Acknowledgment sent to customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps described.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills from customer for further investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, pictures, and medical receipts promptly.
Investigation begun to verify details of the accident and examine submitted evidence for claim validation.
Investigation concluded confirming fault and extent of vehicle damage consistent with the collision report.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover car repairs and medical expenses arising from the accident.
Customer responded positively appreciating the quick handling and transparency throughout the process.
Claim officially approved for payment after customer accepted the proposed settlement offer.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully transferred to the customer's designated bank account.
Claim has been closed following full payment and confirmation from customer that all issues are resolved.
The completed auto accident claim documentation was archived securely as per company policy.
